name: beignet
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small, round or square cake, fried in hot fat : Dessert was an apple beignet with maple walnut ice cream. Lift each beignet from the pan or deep fryer with tongs, letting the excess oil drip off.
More examplesFewer examplesI will be making the beignet dough today; it has to sit in the fridge for 24 hours.The special starter was scallops and smoked salmon with black pudding beignet. The area has become a tourist attraction, with several restaurants and shops, and the world-famous coffee and beignet stand, Cafe du Monde.
